explains: v. 选择；决定（choose 的 ing 形式）
wordGroup: choose from 挑选，从…中选择
as you choose 随你的便
choose to do 选择去做某事
cannot choose but 只得；只好；不得不

sentences.en: How do we go about choosing a good HMO?
sentences.cn: 我们如何着手选择一个好的健康维护组织呢？

sentences.en: Many companies are choosing to display their wares online.
sentences.cn: 许多公司正选择在网上展示其产品。

sentences.en: You must follow your own inclinations when choosing a career.
sentences.cn: 你必须按照自己的意愿选择职业。
